name: In re Nomination Petition of George M. SCHROECK

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of April, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Felicia Raye Schroeck, Erie, for George M. Schroeck.
Charles Anthony Pascal Jr., for David R. Wolfe.
